name: CUMBERLAND SCHOOL COMMITTEE v. RHODE ISLAND STATE LABOR RELATIONS BOARD et al.
name_abbreviation: Cumberland School Committee v. Rhode Island State Labor Relations Board

parties: CUMBERLAND SCHOOL COMMITTEE v. RHODE ISLAND STATE LABOR RELATIONS BOARD et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is granted.

attorneys: Manning, West, Santaniello & Pari, V. James Santaniello, Providence, for petitioner.
Natale L. Urso, Thomas J. Liguori, Jr., Westerly, Vincent F. Kane, Providence, for respondents.
casebody.head_matter:
CUMBERLAND SCHOOL COMMITTEE v. RHODE ISLAND STATE LABOR RELATIONS BOARD et al.
No. 80-135-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
April 24, 1980.
Manning, West, Santaniello & Pari, V. James Santaniello, Providence, for petitioner.
Natale L. Urso, Thomas J. Liguori, Jr., Westerly, Vincent F. Kane, Providence, for respondents.
